data.text:
@IanMac_KBO A few months back this little 
" sanction  " was included in our insurance renewal.
Pay attention.
The stock is not moving but now expiring. Gauge the intent 
https://t.co/f1wwR1U0w7
Pay heed to the loss of national sovereignty. 
The vultures are wheeling.
https://t.co/Nq9eCfbbYM https://t.co/7h6NFqXHHA
@IanMac_KBO Econet Zimbabwe the largest telecoms provider in Zimbabwe used to send out Covid stats to its users. Someone took them to court and ended it.
@IanMac_KBO I tried, you cannot block that number, Nada. That is spam on steroids

@tikab @DaleWil39870290 @ProfTimNoakes If POPI is relevant, I agree the default would be that we are "opted out". They may have sneakily "opted" us all in somehow with some Command Council fine print or similar. I also wonder if there's a deeper legal problem, at Constitution level.

@DaleWil39870290 @IanMac_KBO @ProfTimNoakes Does such a database even exist?  And how is it that the default position is assumed consent anyway?  Thatâ€™s a direct POPI infringement. But you never get an explanation of how they stole your contact details.

@IanMac_KBO @ProfTimNoakes Not a lawyer, but I expect if you aren't on the opt out database for direct marketing then you have no case. If you are, good luck with your claim, seeing as it's really difficult to get any convictions for the crimes we know the ANC is committing.
@IanMac_KBO @ProfTimNoakes 🙄 oh for the love of christ
